Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects of banning exports of hunting trophies on wild mammals. This study was in Cameroon.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (1 STUDY)

Abundance (1 study): A before-and-after study in CameroonÂ found similar hippopotamus abundances before and after a ban on exporting hippopotamus hunting trophies.

BEHAVIOUR (0 STUDIES)
